scripts.lint: prettier pages components --write && eslint pages components --fix
scripts.check-out-temp-branch: git checkout -b temp-branch && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages"
scripts.push-gh-pages: git subtree split --prefix out -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages
scripts.checkout-then-del: git checkout main && git branch -D gh-pages && git branch -D temp-branch
scripts.deploy: npm run build && next export && npm run add-directory-out && npm run check-out-temp-branch && npm run push-gh-pages && npm run checkout-then-del
